meanings.definition: The quality or state of being round in shape.
meanings.sent1: The rotundity of the ball made it perfect for rolling.
meanings.sent2: The rotundity of the moon could be seen clearly in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The rotundity of the snowman's belly made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The rotundity of the earth is often compared to a giant marble.
meanings.sent5: The rotundity of the watermelon made it difficult to slice evenly.

meanings.sent1: The rotundity of the table made it ideal for family gatherings.
meanings.sent2: The rotundity of the clock face made it easy to read from any angle.
meanings.sent3: The rotundity of the cake tempted everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: The rotundity of the planet was mesmerizing when viewed from space.
meanings.sent5: The rotundity of the basketball made it bounce in unexpected ways.

meanings.definition: The condition of being plump or chubby.
meanings.sent1: The rotundity of the baby's cheeks was adorable.
meanings.sent2: The rotundity of the squirrel indicated a plentiful food supply.
meanings.sent3: The rotundity of the cat made it a favorite among the children.
meanings.sent4: The rotundity of the bear suggested it had enjoyed a good hibernation.
meanings.sent5: The rotundity of the penguin made it waddle comically on the ice.
